data.name: 0°N 0°W Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
0°N 0°W - by Colorfiction


The evocative musical soundtrack composed of cascading arpeggios and vast soundscapes to get lost in is now available for your enjoyment.

Tracklist:


1. 0°N 0°W - 02:04
2. Entity relationship diagram - 09:03
3. Field data collector - 03:13
4. Fuzzy tolerance - 06:37
5. Geodetic datum - 08:24
6. Horizontal dilution of precision - 08:48
7. Ionosphere delay - 11:06
8. Left-Right topology - 04:49
9. Many-to-One relate - 04:57
10. Multipath - 05:53
11. Open System Interconnection Protocols - 15:38
12. Orthophoto quadrangle - 04:58
13. Overdetemined position - 11:34
14. Pseudorandom noise code - 15:34
15. Selective availability - 09:05
16. Spherical error probability - 05:42
17. Subwatershed - 02:53
18. Triangulated irregular network - 15:45
19. Universe polygon - 13:33

Ever wanted to take a fantastical multidimensional walkabout anytime, anywhere? Well now you can experience the beautiful soundscapes while studying, working, doing yoga, fragging noobs,waiting in line, filing paperwork and even while riding a horse! (or donkey).

Hopefully this universe of inspiration and dreams invigorates your lifestyle and increases your workplace productivity! Experience 0°N 0°W .

data.short_description: Invigorate your lifestyle and increase workplace productivity with the lush and vibrant soundscapes of 0°N 0°W
data.reviews:
“Stands alongside the likes of Brian Eno’s 77 Million Paintings”
Save or Quit

“The game's accompanying soundtrack is the embodiment of ambiance”
GameSkinny

“A perfect vacation when your mind needs a getaway somewhere new”
Hardcore Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98
  • Processor: Pentium 150-MHz processor or better
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Voodoo 5
  • Storage: 371 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster AWE64
  • Additional Notes: 3.5-inch high-density floppy disk drive!
